attributes.action: Lobby to enforce a 3 p.m. kick off time on a Saturday for all football matches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the last season, The team that I follow has, Out of a possible 38 home & away league games, Only started a match at 3p.m. on a Saturday 12 times. It is unacceptable that football supporters should be made to travel for an lunchtime/evening kick off on a Saturday with limited options on public transport to get there/home, or A 400 mile round trip for a "Sky super Sunday". Please help to ensure that our Sunday's are once again made up of quality time with our loved one's & not stuck in a 15 mile tail back on the M6.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
